results.title: Ghost in the Shell
results.brief_description: In the year 2029, the barriers of our world have been broken down by the net and cybernetics, leaving humans opens to brain-hacking. When a hacker known as ‘The Puppet Master’ begins involving meddling in politics, a group of cybernetically enhanced cops are called in.

constellations_other.name: Robots, robots everywhere
constellations_other.description: Steampunk aesthetics, malevolent AI and cybernetic cops push the frontiers of imagination in this Constellation inspired by Dishonored 2.

results.description: In the year 2029, the barriers of our world have been broken down by the net and cybernetics, leaving humans opens to brain-hacking. When a hacker known as ‘The Puppet Master’ begins involving meddling in politics, a group of cybernetically enhanced cops are called in.
description_for_label: In the year 2029, the barriers of our world have been broken down by the net and cybernetics, leaving humans opens to brain-hacking. When a hacker known as ‘The Puppet Master’ begins involving meddling in politics, a group of cybernetically enhanced cops are called in.

results.title: Get Out
results.brief_description: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family’s overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter’s interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

constellations_other.name: Sweet Country
constellations_other.description: Warwick Thorntonâ€™s feature film Sweet Country is based on the story of Wilaberta Jack, which was told to sound recordist David Tranter by his grandfather and translated into storyboards.

results.title: Get Krack!n
results.creator_credit: Katering Productions, Guesswork Television and Tamasin Simpkin
results.brief_description: Having conquered the cutthroat world of satirical online cooking shows with The Katering Show, the two Kates are ready to take a Sassy Swipe at morning lifestyle television in Get Krack!n.

constellations_other.name: Sequins and sapphires
constellations_other.description: Two of the most striking costumes on the big and small screens embody the glamour of leading First Peoples ladies.

results.title: Gerry
results.headline_credit: Argentina, Jordan and United States of America, 2002
results.brief_description: Two friends named Gerry become lost in the desert after taking a wrong turn. Their attempts to find their way home only lead them into further trouble.
results.headline_credit_for_label: Argentina, Jordan and United States of America, 2002
results.description: Two friends named Gerry become lost in the desert after taking a wrong turn. Their attempts to find their way home only lead them into further trouble.

results.title: Geostorm
results.creator_credit: Twisted Media, Stereo D, Skydance Media, RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Electric Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Dean Devlin, Kirk M. Petruccelli, David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Susan Matheson, Paul Guyot and Brian Adler
results.brief_description: After an unprecedented series of natural disasters threatened the planet, the world’s leaders came together to create an intricate network of satellites to control the global climate and keep everyone safe. But now, something has gone wrong: the system built to protect Earth is attacking it, and it becomes a race against the clock to uncover the real threat before a worldwide geostorm wipes out everything and everyone along with it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Twisted Media, Stereo D, Skydance Media, RatPac-Dune Entertainment, Electric Entertainment, Warner Bros. Pictures, Dean Devlin, Kirk M. Petruccelli, David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Susan Matheson, Paul Guyot and Brian Adler

results.title: Gentleman Jack
results.brief_description: Halifax, West Yorkshire, England, 1832. Anne Lister attempts to revitalize her inherited home, Shibden Hall. Most notably for the time period, a part of her plan is to help the fate of her own family - by taking a wife.

constellations_other.name: Pink, Pose, punk, Pilgrim
constellations_other.description: Alice Babidge's costume design for True History of the Kelly Gang sees the iconic foursome and their accomplices in dresses, a gender-expansive stance that connects to other rebellious outlooks on the world.

results.description: Halifax, West Yorkshire, England, 1832. Anne Lister attempts to revitalize her inherited home, Shibden Hall. Most notably for the time period, a part of her plan is to help the fate of her own family - by taking a wife.

results.title: Gattaca
results.creator_credit: Jersey Films, Columbia Pictures, Sony Pictures, Danny DeVito, Colleen Atwood, Michael Shamberg, Stacey Sher, Andrew Niccol, Jan Roelfs and Janek Sirrs
results.brief_description: In a future society in the era of indefinite eugenics, humans are set on a life course depending on their DNA. Young Vincent Freeman is born with a condition that would prevent him from space travel, yet is determined to infiltrate the GATTACA space program.

constellations_other.name: Dream A Little Crazy: The next stage of human evolution
constellations_other.description: Collaborators Lucy McRae and Rachel Wingfield created a â€˜biological bakeryâ€™ for Architecture In Helsinkiâ€™s "Dream A Little Crazy". Manufacturing a series of mass-produced band members the clip explores speculative science and the future of the human bodyâ€™s evolution.

results.title: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
results.brief_description: A maverick doctor battles with the evil forces lurking beneath a hospital in Romford, engaged in a desperate struggle against poor production values, awful dialogue and unrealistic violence…

constellations_other.name: Sci-fi, surrealism and strangeness
constellations_other.description: Step through Portal 2 to explore the links between its sci-fi comedy and the world of film and TV.

results.title: Gargoyles
results.brief_description: Gargoyles is an American cartoon series produced by Disney Television Animation and Buena Vista Television that features Shakespearean themes.

constellations_other.name: Sweet Country
constellations_other.description: Warwick Thorntonâ€™s feature film Sweet Country is based on the story of Wilaberta Jack, which was told to sound recordist David Tranter by his grandfather and translated into storyboards.

results.description:
Gargoyles is an American cartoon series produced by Disney Television Animation and Buena Vista Television, and originally aired from October 24, 1994 to February 15, 1997. The series is credited for its relatively dark tone, complex story arcs, and melodrama; character arcs were heavily employed throughout the series, as were Shakespearean themes.

A Gargoyles video game adaptation and a spin-off comic series were also created in 1995. The show’s storyline continued from 2006â€“2009 in a comic book series of the same name, written by Greg Weisman and produced by Slave Labor Graphics.
description_for_label:
Gargoyles is an American cartoon series produced by Disney Television Animation and Buena Vista Television, and originally aired from October 24, 1994 to February 15, 1997. The series is credited for its relatively dark tone, complex story arcs, and melodrama; character arcs were heavily employed throughout the series, as were Shakespearean themes.

A Gargoyles video game adaptation and a spin-off comic series were also created in 1995. The show’s storyline continued from 2006â€“2009 in a comic book series of the same name, written by Greg Weisman and produced by Slave Labor Graphics.

results.title: Game of Thrones
results.brief_description: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros. Friction between the houses leads to full-scale war. All while a very ancient evil awakens in the farthest north. Amidst the war, a neglected military order of misfits, the Night’s Watch, is all that stands between the realms of men and icy horrors beyond.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.

constellations_other.name: Magic lanterns and internet culture
constellations_other.description: The basic animation techniques of magic lanterns are strangely similar to internet aesthetics.
